United ended the Gunners' 100 per cent record in the top flig… [+1994 chars]

articles.title: EDDIE HEARN SAYS ANTHONY JOSHUA HAS ACCEPTED TERMS FOR TYSON FURY FIGHT - Fight Hub TV
articles.description: Eddie Hearn confirms that he has been sent terms for a Fury vs Joshua fight by Team Warren and Fury for a 60/40 deal. As Hearn tells Marcos Villegas that him...
